body_html:
You can do both ways:

  1. Create multiple sessions;
  2. Create a big graph which includes multiple small graphs.

And they can share the same set of variables and you just need to make sure it picks the right graph/session to run.
body_text:
You can do both ways:

Create multiple sessions;
Create a big graph which includes multiple small graphs.

And they can share the same set of variables and you just need to make sure it picks the right graph/session to run.
body:
You can do both ways:
1. Create multiple sessions;
2. Create a big graph which includes multiple small graphs.

And they can share the same set of variables and you just need to make sure it picks the right graph/session to run.
